com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasupport
Interface Positionable

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationDescriptor, ApplicationSnapshotDescriptor, CoreDumpDescriptor, DataSourceDescriptor, DataSourceView, HeapDumpDescriptor, LocalHostDescriptor, RemoteHostDescriptor, SnapshotCategory, SnapshotDescriptor, ThreadDumpDescriptor, UnknownHostDescriptor
public interface Positionable

Common interface for entities that can specify their position within other entities.

Author:
Jiri Sedlacek

Nested Class Summary
static class Positionable.PositionableComparator
          Implementation of Comparator based on getPreferredPosition() value.
 
Field Summary
static Comparator COMPARATOR
          Comparator based on getPreferredPosition() value.
static int POSITION_AT_THE_END
          Entity will be placed before first entity with POSITION_LAST position or at the current last position if there's no entity with POSITION_LAST position.
static int POSITION_LAST
          Entity will be placed at the current last position.
 
Method Summary
 int getPreferredPosition()
          Returns preferred position of this entity within other entities.
 

Field Detail

POSITION_AT_THE_END

static final int POSITION_AT_THE_END
Entity will be placed before first entity with POSITION_LAST position or at the current last position if there's no entity with POSITION_LAST position.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

POSITION_LAST

static final int POSITION_LAST
Entity will be placed at the current last position.
